channel.description: Recent content in PC on charliehart.dev

item.title: Voxel Rendering and World Generation System
item.description: Project Summary My undergraduate dissertation project was to create and optimise a voxel based rendering and world generation system. Dissertation Try It! Required Device: Windows PC Development

item.title: Double-Barrelled Doppelgänger
item.description: Project Summary Double-Barrelled Doppelgänger (DBD) was my entry to Mini Jam 117, a 72 hour gamejam that occurs every two weeks on Itch.io. The theme was ‘Ghosts’, as the jam took place in October 2022, near halloween. The additional limitation for the jam’s entries was ‘Shotgun as a Mechanic’, and so DBD features a noisemaker toy shotgun as one of it’s core mechanics. Play Game Double-Barreled Doppelgänger on Itch.io Required Device: Windows PC
